1.sofaString: Palm Sunday Sermon Given By Chaplain                 Mastery Of Material Is Subject Of Speech By Brooks For Marines                 Day's Special Appeal To Military Explained                 The upward march of humanity is struggle against selfishness which betrays sacred obligations attains cowardice which surrenders principle in the name of expediency against ignorance which distorts reason and against passion which makes insane fanatics of ordinarily                 peaceful people said Chaplain Joseph IJ Brooks in his sermon on the subject Mastery of the Ma terial delivered at the service of the Fourth Marines Church in th 'Cathay Theatre yesterday morning Palm Sunday is the best loved day of the church year by military men If not by all Western people the speaker said Because Palm Sunday represents that side of Christianity which is military Pos sibly the East admires that medi tative type of religion which is peaceful quiet and contemplative the religion which thinks with in telligence deeply One of the strange things of history is the fact that Europe and America through Europe adopted Christianity as it state religion its chosen religion Western people particularly the practical type of religion they admire il in their Palm Sunday service Palm Sunday appeals to Western people particularly mili tary men The Palm Sunday re ligion is that type which is indig nant which is enthusiastic that type of religion which is ready tc ght If necessary marching on in 'protest against evils and wrong the ype of religion which is ready with waving banners to go on its crusade wherever they feel crusading necessary Jesus Showed Spirit must admit rather that picture found in the life of our Lord on that Sunday when he rodr up fearlessly and faced his enemies when he attacked the rich men ot his time the evils of his day He was not afraid to speak his mind to hit right at the seat of the graft in the church in the politics that time always get attached to things of this world continual ejection is necessary tc keep the institution of religion trui to all intents and purposes Tlu church we find from time to time deals in secular matters It is in clined to have these people gel mixed up in it with the intention of making money from their wor ship We have had priests and pro all through the history oi ecclesiastics and since the begin ning struggle has been going on between the priests and prophets priest is man to whom certain ritual is important prophet is man who gets away from the per formance of ritual out in the wilderness maybe even in the city away from formal religion he lifts his voice in appeal to the common people to get out of the evils to get away from them true religion is intolerant of profiteers and life and in every country these leeches thrive Racke teers monopoly holders vested in terests grow rich in war All these people who are willing to destroy human souls for the sake of profit Again Palm Sunday is protest also against certain institutions against commercialising the church There are some institutions which are heartless to the people of the earth We have gotten rid of some of these institutions but the work is not yet finished There still re mains something for the crusader In religion to do One of those in stitutions which in the past elicited great loss of life great suffering is the institution of slavery Slavery was washed out through bloodshed on the battlefield Martyrdom For Progress We are making some progress in eliminating the institutions that corrupt and lives of people but only at tremendous cost We have recently seen another one of these institutions outlawed Child labor in the United States China has more man power more un skilled labor than any other coun try anywhere yet you find child labor everywhere prevalent But it won t be long till the march of progress in China will find child labor abolished Jesus was arrested tried by mob and finally he was executed and since that time there have been millions of martyrs Martyrdom is usually the price of progress En trenched sin puts up bitter fight The upward march of humanity is struggle against selfishness which betrays sacred obligations against cowardice which surrenders prin ciple in the name or expediency                 against ignorance which distort reason and against passion makes insane of or- peaceful people Slow and has been the march of progress And when we have eliminated these evils we will have wrought more friendship more faith more hope for all the children who
